text: Andrew Powell (born 19 February 1950) is an English musician. He has been one of the lead guitarists for the band Wishbone Ash since 1969. Some have called him one of the most influential guitarists in history, along with other Wishbone Ash guitarists Ted Turner and Laurie Wisefield. ==References== Category:1950 births Category:Living people Category:English guitarists Category:Singer-songwriters from London Category:Progressive rock singers
title: Andy Powell
